value.0: Welcome to the Three Steps Academy, <Sir/Madam>. How might I be of assistance?
<Sir/Madam> you are in the esteemed halls of the Three Steps Academy. The Premier training school for shadowdancers.

<StartAction>[She looks down her nose at you]</Start> If I had sensed any connection to the shadows within you then I would have offered to register you on the spot. As it stands, if you wish to explore developing such a connection you can contact one of our current instructors. You will find their names, and specialties listed on the notice board.
Welcome to the Three Steps Academy, <Sir/Madam>. I do not recognize you as one of our students, but I sense an affinity for shadows about you. Are you here to register for one of our classes?
Wonderful, if you would just sign your name in our ledger, I'll get your text book.
<StartAction>[She slides a text book across the counter to you]</Start> Keep this with you at all times, study it thoroughly. The instructors will be expecting you to know it.

When you have learned the <StartHighlight>Shadow Evade</Start> skill, return to Instructor Aldius and take your first test. Seek out one of our instructors posted on the notice board for help developing your skills.
<Sir/Madam> you are in the esteemed halls of the Three Steps Academy. The Premier training school for shadowdancers.
Welcome back, <FirstName>.
Welcome back, <FirstName>.
Welcome back, <Master/Mistress> <FirstName>. How may I be of assistance?
Of course.
Welcome back, <Master/Mistress> <FirstName>. How may I be of assistance?
Of course.
No new students have registered today.
Yes. These are our new students.
Nothing. I'm just looking around.
What is this place?
Alright. I'll be going now...
Training! I would like training. How do I proceed?
Alright. I'll be going now...
No thanks, I'm just looking.
Yes, sign me up!
No, I've changed my mind.
Sign the ledger.
Alright, I'll be going now.
Do you have any other guidance for me?
Alright, I'll be going now.
I don't understand.What is this place?
Can you tell me who has passed through?
Thank you.
Can you tell me who has passed through?
Thank you. I'll be going now.
Have you registered any new students today?
Thank you. I'll be going now.
Thank you. I'll be going now.
I want to ask something else.
